entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:59 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

Visibility: 6.4 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023
